thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sage International Group Announces Offer By Sun International Securities

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sage International Group Announces Offer By Sun International Securities

organizations.name: brief-sage international group announces offer by sun international securities

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Sage International Group Ltd:
* ‍SIMPLE CHEER AND CHAU CHEOK WA​ TO SUBSCRIBE TO 2 & 1 NEW SHARES OF OFFEROR FOR HK$45.7 MILLION AND HK$22.8 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY
* ANNOUNCES OFFER BY SUN INTERNATIONAL SECURITIES FOR AND ON BEHALF OF HEADING CHAMPION FOR ALL ISSUED SHARES OF SAGE INTERNATIONAL
* DEAL FOR SHARE OFFER PRICE OF HK$0.16 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
